str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage

parse: Verb - Hifil - Perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Jonathan -- 'the LORD has given', the name of a number of Israelites
Malchi-shua -- 'my king is wealth', a son of Saul
Abinadab -- 'my father is noble', three Israelites
Eshbaal -- 'man of Baal', a son of Saul
